title: My Weather
overview: My Weather App is a web application that provides users with real-time weather forecasts based on their current location. It fetches and displays detailed weather data, including temperature, humidity, wind speed, and a 5-day forecast from the Open Weather API and Location API,.
features:
• Display weather in different cities.
• Provides location, weather, humidity, wind, pressure, and a 5-day weather forecast.
• Responsive on different devices.
• Developed with HTML, CSS, and JavaScript.
• Weather API: https://openweathermap.org/api
• Location API: https://openweathermap.org/api/geocoding-api

title: My Quiz App
overview: The Quiz App is a fun and interactive web application that lets users take quizzes across multiple categories. Built using JavaScript, HTML, and CSS, the app offers a dynamic experience by fetching questions in real time through the Open Quiz API. Users can test their knowledge on a variety of topics while enjoying a clean and responsive interface.

title: Feedback
overview:
The Feedback App is a React-based web application designed to make it easy for users to provide feedback and rate services. With its simple and user-friendly interface, the app allows users to share their thoughts, rate experiences, and contribute valuable insights. This makes it a practical tool for collecting feedback in a structured and efficient way.
The app uses JSON Server as a mock backend to store and retrieve feedback data. This setup allows for quick testing and development.

title: Workout G.E.M.
overview: The Workout G.E.M. App is an Android application designed to help users stay on top of their fitness goals by making it easier to track workouts, set goals, and monitor progress. Whether you’re just starting your fitness journey or you’re a seasoned athlete, the app provides a simple and intuitive way to log exercises and keep track of your daily activity. It also offers insights into your workout habits, helping you stay motivated and make informed decisions to improve your fitness routine.

title: Smart Food
overview:
The Smart Food App is a user-friendly iOS mobile application designed to help users efficiently manage their food inventory in the fridge. The app allows users to view, add, edit, and delete food items with ease. It features expiry notifications that users can enable or disable, providing timely reminders to prevent food waste.
The app uses Firebase as its backend database to securely store and manage user data.

title: Library
overview: An iOS app to view, add, update, and delete books from a library. The back-end is a Node.js app with REST API and deployed on Render. It manages data from both local MongoDB local database and MongoDB Atlas cloud.

title: Roll A Ball
overview: A 3D game to control a ball wtih mouse or kwyboard on a scene. Developed with Unity & C#.
